group_1.textLeft: Okay...it's almost time!

group_1.textRight: I see you are wearing your chef's jacket@in your bedroom again.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, and I have a very good reason to!
Today is the day they announce@the results!

group_1.textRight: Announce the results?@Oh...the entrance exam.
But what does that have to do with your@chef's jacket?

group_1.textLeft: Okay, you dim-witted rabbit-thing,@let me explain it to you!
The results of the entrance exam@are about to get posted online!
Once I see that I passed, [chara:300902:motion_100]I'm gonna make@a super special meal to celebrate!
That's how this is gonna go!

group_1.textRight: I see.
You still have faith you'll pass, @despite your slim chances, I see.

group_1.textLeft: What'd I say before?!@I don't need your negativity!
Hey! It's time!@It's time for the results!

group_1.textRight: Wonderful.@You made it into Mizuna Girls' Academy.

group_1.textLeft: There's nothing wonderful about it!
My first choice was Liliana, but I failed...
Making it into Mizuna Girls' Academy@doesn't mean anything.

group_1.textRight: Manaka...
You should make a contract with—

group_1.textLeft: Huh? What's this?@An announcement?
Mizuna Girls' Academy...@St. Liliana Academy...
Student council..."Exchange party"?@To deepen friendship..."Over lunch"?!
Over lunch?!
(That's it!)
I may not have made it into@St. Liliana Academy...
But I'll never, ever give up!
I will spread the word about @how amazing our restaurant is!
Are you...trying to pick a fight?![chara:800100:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]

group_1.textRight: Let me introduce myself!
I just came from the entrance ceremony.@I'm a freshman. My name's Manaka Kurumi.
I'd like to speak with the@student council president!

group_1.textLeft: A freshman? What business does@a freshman have with the student council?

group_1.textRight: I heard this May you're going to have@an exchange party...
With Mizuna Girls' Academy and@St. Liliana Academy's student councils.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, that's right.

group_1.textRight: I understand that there will be
food at the party for both@student councils to enjoy.

group_1.textLeft: You are correct.

group_1.textRight: If that's the case,
then let me make the food for you!

group_1.textLeft: Huh?[chara:800100:lipSynch_0] You?[chara:800100:cheek_2:effect_emotion_surprise_0:lipSynch_1][se:7226_shock]@[chara:800100:cheek_2:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json]Prepare the whole meal?!

group_1.textRight: Yep!

group_1.textLeft: Uhm… Yeah…@About that…
I've already asked my favorite @restaurant to cater for us, so…

group_1.textRight: Oh! @That's no problem at all!
All you have to do is call them @and cancel, and switch to me!

group_1.textLeft: Huh?!

group_1.textRight: I don't know what restaurant you're @talking about, but...
I guarantee you, my cooking@is a thousand times better!

group_1.textLeft: Whaaat?!@Who do you think you are?!
*Cough*@Anyway…
We would never do anything@so rude and out of the blue!
We've already made our decision!

group_1.textCenter: Now if you don't mind, we're very busy here!@Shoo! Shoo! Off you go!

group_1.textRight: Hey, what are you doing?! Quit it!@Don't push me!
You're missing a chance to eat@amazing food only I can make!

group_1.textCenter: Why?!@All I did was tell them the truth!
